details: The scheme "Konkani Drama Competition" is a state-level cultural initiative by the Kala Academy, under the Department of Art and Culture, Government of Goa. It is organized annually to encourage and promote theatre activities among Goan institutions.
benefits: An auditorium with permissible infrastructure is provided free of charge.
80% of gate collection from ticket sales is given to participating institutions.
Prizes are awarded by a panel of judges.
eligibility: The institution’s registration must be active and valid at the time of application.
The institution should be registered under the Societies Registration Act, 1860.
application_process: Step 1: Take a printout of the prescribed format of the application form available on the official website of Kala Academy, Goa.
Step 2: Fill in all the mandatory fields, paste the passport-sized photograph (signed across, if required), and attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required).
Step 3: Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the documents, within the prescribed period (if any), to the Member Secretary, Kala Academy, Goa.
Step 4: Request a receipt or acknowledgement from the concerned authority to whom the application has been submitted.
